markdown.markdown:
All motion graphics was done in Adobe Creative Suite and Cinema 4D. Promo videos for REELZ Channel made in collaboration with team of video editors. Motion Graphics, assets, animation, special effects, and keying are done by me. #motiongraphicsdesign #socialmedia #graphicdesign #branddesign ::::{.columns} :::{.column width="49%"}
